grViz("
digraph boxes_and_circles {

  node [shape = box,
        fontname = Helvetica]

  DS [label = '@@1']
  RQ [label = '@@2']
  US [label = '@@3']
  BS [label = '@@4']
  MS [label = '@@5']
  Publishing [label = '@@6']
  
  # several 'edge' statements
  
  RQ -> DS
  DS -> US
  US -> DataViz

  US -> BS
  BS -> Publishing
  Publishing -> MS
  BS -> MS
  
}

[1]: 'Data Set'
